OPTION.PROMPT: Never leave feedback - I will use ePier to leave it manually
Leave positive after purchase is paid, or set complete - never leave bad feedback.

DIV.NAME: ALPHA
DIV.TITLE: Welcome!
DIV.META: Before using this you must have an account from ePier.com - free registration, no listing fees!

INPUT.NAME: product:epier:headline
INPUT.HELP: Enter a title for the auction item 60 characters maximum

INPUT.NAME: product:zoovy:html
INPUT.HELP: Please enter a description for your auction item.

INPUT.NAME: product:epier:startprice
INPUT.HELP: Please indicate the starting bid price.

INPUT.NAME: product:epier:reserve
INPUT.HELP: Enables you to set a minimum required selling price, see the epier rules for more information.

INPUT.NAME: product:epier:buyitnow
INPUT.HELP: Enables a person to end an auction by agreeing to pay the buy it now price.

INPUT.NAME: product:epier:quantity
INPUT.HELP: Please indicate the quantity of this item you will be auctioning.

DIV.DISPLAY: Product images will be used for the Auction.

INPUT.NAME: product:epier:autorelist
INPUT.HELP: ePier will automatically resubmit your auction until it sells.

DIV.DISPLAY: Please select the appropriate payment settings to reflect your store's policies.

INPUT.NAME: merchant:epier:feedback_good
INPUT.HELP: If you plan on using automated feedback, leave a good feedback message here.

DIV.DISPLAY: When you're ready to launch just click the button below.

BUTTON.PROMPT: Click here to Review and Launch

DIV.NAME: OMEGA
DIV.TITLE: Review
DIV.META: Please verify your listing information before you proceed.

DIV.NAME: CATPAGE
DIV.TITLE: Category 1
DIV.META: Please select your primary category from the list below. Press NEXT to return to the previous form.
